definition: to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)

sentences.english: XuChan reasonable request the wealth DingGu reconstruction, haed with screen appear.
sentences.chinese: 合理徐婵要求财旺把丁家改建时，有维带著银屏呈现。

sentences.english: He is watching TV, the screen casting its lurid blue light across his face.
sentences.chinese: 他在看电视，银屏红蓝色的的光投在他的脸上。

sentences.english: Alone with the small screen, I am answerable to no one.
sentences.chinese: 单独面对着银屏，我就谁的话也不用听了。

sentences.english: Helen is a novice to the Hollywood scene and has just be friended Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 海伦是好莱坞银屏的新人，她刚刚和卡门交上朋友。

sentences.english: And lo and behold, the screen suddenly bristles with something that looks like class consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 而且你看，银屏上突然出现了一些阶级意识的东西。

definition: to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
role of vivacious young female in Chinese opera
